title: The betraying of Christ Iudas in despaire. The seuen words of our Sauior on the crosse. With other poems on the Passion.
author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?
notes: Dedication signed: S.R., i.e. Samuel Rowlands.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: Poems vpon the Passion.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
